Subject: Unable to Update "On hold" tickets
Description:
Hi,
Using the new support tool, we are not able to add any comments or request updates on tickets set to "On Hold" status.
The option to "Provide Feedback" also do not works
Please let us know how can we request update on those tickets and how to keep an official track / logs of the requests.
Solution_Comment__c: This situation was saved by a modification brought to the SF.
